sentence: The  Hamas  attack  that  day  from  Gaza  into  southern  Israel  has  been  followed  by  a  war  between  the  militant  Palestinian  group  and  Israeli  forces  that  so  far  has  killed  more  than  19,000  Palestinians,  most  of  them  women  and  children,  according  to  Gaza's  health  ministry.
Israel  says  about  1,200  people  were  killed  in  the  Oct.  7  attack.
Israel  says  at  least  11  soldiers  and  civilians  have  been  killed  on  the  Israeli  side  of  the  border.
Yet  the  daily  images  of  Israeli  destruction  and  Palestinians  killed  in  Gaza  are  swaying  public  opinion.
